dutchsentence: Veel Nederlanders gaan op vakantie naar het buitenland.
englishtranslate: Many Dutch people go on holiday to a foreign country (abroad).

vietnamese: người nước ngoài (các người nước ngoài)
dutchsentence: Er wonen veel buitenlanders in deze stad.
englishtranslate: Many foreigners live in this city.

vietnamese: đại sứ quán (các đại sứ quán)
dutchsentence: We moesten naar de ambassade voor een visum.
englishtranslate: We had to go to the embassy for a visa.

dutchsentence: Vergeet je paspoort niet mee te nemen op reis.
englishtranslate: Don't forget to take your passport with you on your trip.

vietnamese: thẻ căn cước (các thẻ căn cước)
dutchsentence: Je moet je identiteitskaart laten zien bij de douane.
englishtranslate: You must show your identity card at customs.

dutchsentence: De organisatie van het festival was perfect.
englishtranslate: The organization of the festival was perfect.

dutchsentence: We moeten de vakantie goed plannen.
englishtranslate: We must plan the holiday well.

dutchsentence: Hij plande de aanval in het geheim.
englishtranslate: He planned the attack in secret.

dutchsentence: Zij helpt graag om evenementen te organiseren.
englishtranslate: She likes to help organize events.

dutchsentence: De school organiseerde een groot sporttoernooi.
englishtranslate: The school organized a large sports tournament.

dutchsentence: Iedereen ouder dan achttien jaar mag stemmen.
englishtranslate: Everyone older than eighteen years may vote.

dutchsentence: Zij stemde op de groene partij tijdens de verkiezingen.
englishtranslate: She voted for the green party during the elections.
